# archestra_role (Resource)

Manages custom RBAC roles.

**⚠️ Backend API Limitation**: This resource is currently blocked because the backend does not expose role management endpoints. The schema is defined and ready, but CRUD operations will fail with a clear error message until the backend APIs are available.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a custom RBAC role with specific permissions
# Note: This resource requires backend API support for role management
resource "archestra_role" "data_scientist" {
  name        = "Data Scientist"
  description = "Custom role for data science team members"
  permissions = [
    "data:read",
    "data:write",
    "model:train",
    "model:deploy",
    "experiment:create",
    "experiment:read"
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role
- `permissions` (List of String) List of permissions granted by this role

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the role

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Role identifier
